name: gyver-project
description: Provides powerful and stable tools for all your projects. We made it simple and user friendly : no useless tools, just what you need to manage your projects.
author: Thibaut Gauvin, Robin Billy, Romain Dalleau, Romain Lesniak, Remi Koci, Alicia Belkovski, Brandon Beurion, Guillaume Roche, Karim Tayeb, Ralph Lewiz.
